pages.text: Logistic Overclockers allow individual cards (except the Energy ones) to operate more quickly.$(br2)For example, Item Cards can only extract at most 8 items every 20 ticks (1 second). With 4 overclockers installed they can reach 64 items every 4 ticks!$(br2)See the Cards section for more details on how each card is affected by overclockers.
